mapper.select: select * from (select * from category group by jejosa) cate left join (select c.jejosa as jejosa, count(*) as count from category c inner join detail d on c.car_num=d.car_num inner join grade g on g.d_id=d.d_id inner join sell s on s.g_id = g.g_id group by c.jejosa) t on cate.jejosa = t.jejosa

select * from (select * from category where jejosa=#{jejosa}) mo left join (select model,count(*) as count from (select * from category where jejosa=#{jejosa}) c inner join detail d on c.car_num=d.car_num inner join grade g on g.d_id=d.d_id inner join sell s on s.g_id = g.g_id group by model) t on mo.model = t.model

select * from (select d_id, detail from (select * from category where car_num=#{car_num}) m inner join detail d where m.car_num = d.car_num) t1 left join (select detail, count(*) as count from (select d_id, detail from (select * from category where car_num=#{car_num}) m inner join detail d where m.car_num = d.car_num) t inner join grade g on g.d_id=t.d_id inner join sell s on s.g_id = g.g_id group by detail) t2 on t1.detail = t2.detail

select * from (select * from grade where d_id=#{d_id} group by grade1) t1 left join (select grade1, count(*) as count from (select * from grade where d_id=#{d_id}) g inner join sell s on s.g_id = g.g_id group by grade1) t2 on t1.grade1 = t2.grade1 order by t1.grade1

select * from (select * from grade where d_id=#{d_id} and grade1=#{grade1}) t1 left join (select grade2, count(*) as count from (select * from grade where d_id=#{d_id} and grade1=#{grade1}) g inner join sell s on s.g_id = g.g_id group by grade2) t2 on t1.grade2 = t2.grade2

select * from (select * from category where abroad = #{abroad} group by jejosa) t1 left join (select jejosa, count(*) as count from (select * from category where abroad = #{abroad}) c inner join detail d on c.car_num=d.car_num inner join grade g on g.d_id=d.d_id inner join sell s on s.g_id = g.g_id group by jejosa) t2 on t1.jejosa = t2.jejosa
